languages.text: "У Глейто шкура покрылась инеем. В чем бы ни была проблема — давайте избавимся от нее. Быстро".
languages.translation_comment:
During Weisz's quest at the Astropathic Chapel.
Argenta: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

traits.locale_text: "У Глейто шкура покрылась инеем. В чем бы не была проблема — давайте избавимся от нее. Быстро".

languages.text: "There is frost all over Glaito's coat. Whatever problem we are here to solve, let's do it quickly."
languages.translation_comment:
During Weisz's quest at the Astropathic Chapel.
Argenta: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."
languages.original_text: "У Глейто шкура покрылась инеем. В чем бы ни была проблема — давайте избавимся от нее. Быстро".

languages.text: 「グライトの毛皮が霜だらけだ。ここで対処すべき問題が何であれ、早急に片付けよう」
languages.original_text: "There is frost all over Glaito's coat. Whatever problem we are here to solve, let's do it quickly."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトの毛皮が霜だらけだ。ここで対処すべき問題が何であれ、早急に片付けよう」

languages.text: "Glaitos Fell ist voller Frost. Welches Problem wir hier auch lösen müssen, tun wir es zügig."
languages.original_text: "There is frost all over Glaito's coat. Whatever problem we are here to solve, let's do it quickly."

traits.locale_text: "Glaitos Fell ist voller Frost. Welches Problem wir hier auch lösen müssen, tun wir es zügig."

languages.text: « Glaito est couvert de givre. Quel que soit le problème que nous ayons à régler ici, finissons-en rapidement. »
languages.original_text: "There is frost all over Glaito's coat. Whatever problem we are here to solve, let's do it quickly."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito est couvert de givre. Quel que soit le problème que nous ayons à régler ici, finissons-en rapidement. »

languages.text: «El pelaje de Glaito se ha helado. Sea cual sea el problema que venimos a resolver, hagámoslo rápido».
languages.original_text: "There is frost all over Glaito's coat. Whatever problem we are here to solve, let's do it quickly."

traits.locale_text: «El pelaje de Glaito se ha helado. Sea cual sea el problema que venimos a resolver, hagámoslo rápido».

languages.text: “格雷托身上已经结满了霜。虽然不知道要解决什么问题，但我们必须速战速决。”
languages.original_text: "There is frost all over Glaito's coat. Whatever problem we are here to solve, let's do it quickly."

traits.locale_text: “格雷托身上已经结满了霜。虽然不知道要解决什么问题，但我们必须速战速决。”

languages.text: "Glaito'nun kaplamasını don kaplamış. Sorun her neyse bir an evvel çözelim."
languages.original_text: "There is frost all over Glaito's coat. Whatever problem we are here to solve, let's do it quickly."
